Title: The Currant Alderidge Flannel Casual Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This shirt simply emanates fall Woven with a sturdy but not thick oxford fabric that s been brushed for softness and warmth The Alderidge is bound to become a favorite Vibrant colors set this shirt apart from the rest without standing out Pair with your favorite vest or sport coat for an effortless seasonal look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Albiate in Italy Collar The Alden collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Length Shortened for untucked or tucked wear Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Red Hasney Plaid Casual Shirt

Title: The Blue Harrell Lux Stripe Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>We can almost guarantee you don t have a shirt like The Harrell Lux Stripe This classic thin stripe from Albini has been updated with a twist An airy dobby weave lends the shirt some texture and personality while also making it more breathable The deep blue stripe is the perfect business shirt for early fall when some added personality is welcome Layer under a solid sport coat and pair with a subtly patterned silk tie for a refined professional look Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Albini in Italy Collar The Ledbury Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Black Catlett Shirt Jacket Casual Shirt

Title: The Light Grey Heather Pennington Houndstooth Casual Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This is not your grandpa s stuffy houndstooth shirt Woven from an incredibly soft and lightweight twill this versatile style will transition seamlessly to the warmer months The Pennington comes with a lot of visual interest thanks to its heather yarn and houndstooth pattern Switch up your solid Oxford or poplin rotation with this classic twill style Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from the world s finest mills Collar Button down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Buttons Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water only Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Blue Penbrooke Wrinkle Free Twill Dress Shirt

Title: The White Bancroft Poplin Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>It s time to rethink what you know about luxury poplin Introducing our most luxurious white shirt yet The Bancroft Poplin is composed of Gatsby Egyptian cotton known for its strength and ultrafine yarn size Renowned Italian mill Thomas Mason grows this incredible cotton on the banks of the Nile River and crafted this rich poplin with an incredibly soft feel and light weight A perfect shirt for any formal or business occasion all year round Fabric 100 Egyptian Cotton sourced from luxury Italian mill Thomas Mason Collar The Ledbury Mid Spread collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a trim fit throughout the torso Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons A lowered second button creates the perfect V at the neckline and prevents the shirt from being buttoned too high or too low Reinforced buttons with tension threading to ensure they stay fastened for the life of the shirt Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="false"><string>15 / 34 - Classic</string><variant>31506840715351</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15.5 / 34 - Classic</string><variant>29459814416471</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16 / 35 - Classic</string><variant>29459814449239</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16.5 / 35 - Classic</string><variant>29459814482007</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17 / 36 - Classic</string><variant>29459814514775</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17.5 / 36 - Classic</string><variant>29459814547543</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>18 / 37 - Classic</string><variant>29459814580311</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>18.5 / 37 - Classic</string><variant>29459814613079</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15 / 34 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814645847</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>15.5 / 34 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814678615</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16 / 35 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814711383</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>16.5 / 35 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814744151</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17 / 36 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814776919</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>17.5 / 36 - Tailored</string><variant>29459814842455</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The White Draper Hidden-Button Dress Shirt
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This is no ordinary Oxford The Draper is constructed with 100 Egyptian cotton from the legendary Italian mill Thomas Mason Using extra long staple cotton grown exclusively in the Nile Delta the result is an incredibly fine lightweight and soft Oxford Special features include a hidden button down collar to ensure you look sharp with or without a tie The Draper is an elevated dress style ideal for your next business or formal occasion Fabric 100 Cotton sourced from Thomas Mason Collar Hidden button down collar finished with a canvassed interlining to prevent unwanted folding and collar collapse Cuff Double button barrel cuff Fit Available in classic and tailored fit Tailored fit features a darted back for a slim fit throughout the torso Length Regular for tucked in wear Buttons Mother of Pearl buttons fastened with tension threading Gentle machine or hand wash in cold water Hang or lay flat to dry as machine drying can cause shrinkage Remove collar stays before laundering Avoid excessive heat and use little to no starch to prolong the life of the shirt nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Title: The Navy Chalmers Sport Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This is one of our absolute favorites Rich Italian wool is woven into an incredibly soft twill to craft this navy sport coat The perfect daily driver for the office but refined enough for your next formal occasion A welcome addition to any man s wardrobe Lined and finished with double vents two flap pockets and a welt pocket on the left chest Fabric 100 Wool Fit Our new Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is lined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Made in Italy Dry Clean Only nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>32374118056023</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>38</string><variant>32374118088791</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>32374118121559</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>42</string><variant>32374118154327</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>44</string><variant>32374118187095</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>46</string><variant>32374118219863</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Deep Blue Walker Sport Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Effortlessly sharp That s what the Walker Sport Coat is for With a durable blend of modal cotton and stretch fabric this twill jacket is a sharp layer you can throw on for any evening out Featuring a sun faded deep blue color for a slightly more casual look Unlined to offer perfect fit and finished with double vents two patch pockets and a welt pocket on the left chest Fabric 69 Modal 28 Cotton 3 Stretch Fit Our new Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Made in Italy Dry Clean Only nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>32374117597271</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>38</string><variant>32374117630039</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>32374117662807</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>42</string><variant>32374117695575</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>44</string><variant>32374117761111</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>46</string><variant>32374117793879</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Black Dunmore Sport Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The sport coat that captures a season This Italian made jacket is crafted with a wool silk and synthetic blend for a textured look and feel Black and white yarn create a classic houndstooth in a perfect scale not too large not too small The Dunmore will bring versatility and a unique look to your fall winter wardrobe Available exclusively in our slim fit Unlined to offer perfect fit and finished with double vents two patch pockets and a welt pocket on the left chest Fabric 44 Wool 19 Polyester 19 Cotton 9 Silk 9 Nylon Fit Our new Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Made in Italy Dry Clean Only nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>32374117138519</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>38</string><variant>32374117171287</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>32374117204055</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>42</string><variant>32374117236823</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>44</string><variant>32374117269591</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>46</string><variant>32374117302359</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Cornflower Arley Sport Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>It s likely you won t have one of these in your wardrobe already This rich wide wale corduroy has nostalgic yet refined character Hailing from corduroy and velvet specialists at a near two century old mill in Italy you can be sure this is some of the best around The cornflower blue color has an elegant appearance with just a touch of sheen Available exclusively in our slim fit Unlined to offer perfect fit and finished with double vents two patch pockets and a welt pocket on the left chest Fabric 100 Cotton Fit Our new Slim Fit features higher armholes and a more tailored waist and runs trimmer than our old slim styles Sport coat is unlined If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Two button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Made in Italy Dry Clean Only nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>32374116712535</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>38</string><variant>32374116745303</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>32374116778071</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>42</string><variant>32374116810839</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>44</string><variant>32374116843607</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>46</string><variant>32374116876375</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: The Navy Devonshire Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>This 100 flannel wool coat is the definitive way to look sharp not cold Made in Italy with the utmost attention to detail The Devonshire features a removable liner front for ultimate versatility Leave it in on blustery days so you don t have to deal with the bulk of a popped collar and lapel For a more classic look simply unzip the liner Fitted with a soft shoulder for a modern silhouette with our without a sport coat underneath Fabric 100 Wool Fit A similar profile to our sport coats tailored but not too slim Above the knee length provides a flattering look on men of all shapes and sizes If in between sizes we recommend sizing up Buttons Three button closure Four non functioning cuff buttons to allow for sleeve alterations Made in Italy Dry Clean Only</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>36</string><variant>32374118678615</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>38</string><variant>32374118711383</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>40</string><variant>32374118744151</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>42</string><variant>32374118776919</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>44</string><variant>32374118809687</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>46</string><variant>32374118842455</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Rains Green Short Hooded Coat
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Short Hooded Coat features a straight body large pockets with button flaps ventilation airholes and a string detail along the hemline The style is completed with a drawstring hood featuring Rains signature built in cap Made from waterproof matte PU this lightweight rain jacket is an ode to nostalgia through its classic silhouette and utilitarian design details 64 polyester 36 polyurethane Water column pressure 4000 mm Drawstring hood with built in cap Front placket with snap buttons Ventilation under armpit Adjustable cuffs Double welted front pockets Adjustable elastic string at hemline Ultrasonically welded seamsRains apparel runs about half a size larger than normal Consider sizing down if you are often between sizes nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>XS/S</string><variant>32351105482839</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>S/M</string><variant>32351105515607</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>M/L</string><variant>32351105548375</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>L/XL</string><variant>32351105581143</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Rains Black Trekker Jacket
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Designed for the seasons between seasons this jacket has been designed to offer warmth when the temperature starts to drop Trekker Jacket carries out Rains waterproof breathable PU in horizontally welted quilt lines across both the chest and sleeves Running along the side is a non quilted insulated PU panel for increased mobility Trekker Jacket is finished with a bomber collar ribbed cuffs hidden side pockets with a snap button closure and a waterproof front zipper closure Shell 57 polyester 43 polyurethane Lining 100 Nylon Insulation layer 100 polyester Weather resistant hardware made of stainless steel and durable rubber Bomber collar Waterproof coil zipper Hidden pockets at side seam closed with snap button Rib cuffsRains apparel runs about half a size larger than normal Consider sizing down if you are often between sizes nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>XS/S</string><variant>32351105777751</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>S/M</string><variant>32351105810519</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>M/L</string><variant>32351105843287</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>L/XL</string><variant>32351105876055</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Rains Green Fleece Zip Puller
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Fleece Zip Puller has been created to act as an additional layer for dropping temperatures This in between layer has been designed to be worn over a base layer or under Rains outerwear Rains Fleece Zip Puller is constructed of a 280g m2 weft knitted two sided brushed polar fleece fabric The style also features a unique PU coating on the front and back yoke of the jacket to guard against inclement weather Body 100 weft knitted polyester polar fleece Yoke 100 waterproof polyurethane coating PU coated coil zipper Silicone puller Stand up collar Elasticated cuffs Elastic Adjustable cords at the hem Ventilation airholes at underarmRains apparel runs about half a size larger than normal Consider sizing down if you are often between sizes nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>XS/S</string><variant>32351105351767</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>S/M</string><variant>32351105384535</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>M/L</string><variant>32351105417303</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>L/XL</string><variant>32351105450071</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Puffer Jacket is an insulated winter jacket from Rains Thermal category made from a breathable yet waterproof fabric Designed with seamless woven chambers the Puffer Jacket features featherless insulation providing warmth in extreme conditions The jacket is crafted with stainless steel and durable rubber trimmings welt pockets a padded hoodie and coated in Rains signature matte PU Shell 57 polyester 43 polyurethane Lining 100 Nylon Insulation 100 featherless insulation Weather resistant trimmings made of stainless steel and durable rubber Two spacious front welt pockets Drawstring padded hood Ultrasonically double welded seams Elastic cuffsRains apparel runs about half a size larger than normal Consider sizing down if you are often between sizes nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>XS/S</string><variant>32351105908823</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>S/M</string><variant>32351105941591</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>M/L</string><variant>32351105974359</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>L/XL</string><variant>32351106007127</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Tom Beckbe Tensaw ES for Ledbury
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Tensaw ES is our favorite jacket from our friends at Tom Beckbe This waxed cotton jacket is designed for the field city and everywhere in between The Tensaw ES has a durable 6oz waxed cotton shell an ideal weight for moderate climates that develops a rich patina over time A cotton liner inspired by Alabama red clay adds a touch of color to the interior and a collar lined with Bedford corduroy provides welcome protection from the cold Large front bellow pockets allow for ample storage and conceal additional welt pockets to keep hands warm A hidden Napoleon pocket provides discrete storage for cellphones and other valuables Featuring an exclusive custom cast Ledbury button snap Fabric Shell 100 Cotton Body Lining 100 Cotton Sleeve Lining 100 Polyester Fit Set in sleeves provide flattering structure through the shoulders while gusseted underarms a bi swing back and classic fit through the midsection allow for a full range of motion Rinse dirt and debris by hand with cold water and air dry Do not iron Do not bleach Do not dry clean Do not machine wash Do not use artificial heat to dry expose to open flames hang on radiators or wear on a heated seat Reproof waxed outer shell as needed nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="false"><string>S</string><variant>30323313967191</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>M</string><variant>30323313999959</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>L</string><variant>30323314032727</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>XL</string><variant>30323314065495</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>XXL</string><variant>30323314098263</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Blundstone Rustic Black Dress Chelsea Boot
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Blundstone has a legacy of making great looking boots that last Chelsea boots have journeyed from 20th century workwear to British mod rock in the 60s Thankfully along their style journey they never lost their hard working roots These water resistant durable boots are just as at home in the dirt as in the office We chose this specific style because of the toe shape It s a bit slimmed down with a chiseled toe for a more modern look So whether you re heading out in the city or on the farm these boots have you covered Rustic black premium leather Black elastic side Durable TPU outsole Cushioned midsole for comfort SPS Max Comfort system for outstanding shock absorption Removable comfort footbed Lightweight and comfortable First remove any caked dirt on your boots with a soft bristled brush or damp cloth and leave your boots to air dry Please ensure that your boots are away from direct sunlight or any heaters as they will dry out the leather Apply leather polish spray or cream to the leather to help maintain your boots If you are using a polish for the first time try it on an inconspicuous area of the boot to check whether it alters the colour or appearance If using a polish apply a small amount of leather cleaner to a polishing cloth or brush and rub onto the shoe in circular motions nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp; Fit</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Click buy for more sizing information.</sectionBody></section><section id="3"><sectionTitle>Shipping &amp; Returns</sectionTitle><sectionBody>Free shipping and returns for all orders above $125</sectionBody></section><sizes><size instock="true"><string>8</string><variant>32358341902423</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>8.5</string><variant>32358341935191</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>9</string><variant>32358341967959</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>9.5</string><variant>32358342000727</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>10</string><variant>32358342033495</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>10.5</string><variant>32358342066263</variant></size><size instock="true"><string>11</string><variant>32358342099031</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>11.5</string><variant>37536785924282</variant></size><size instock="false"><string>12</string><variant>32358342131799</variant></size></sizes></sections>

Title: Nisolo Andres All Weather Boot Waxed Brown
Body (HTML): <sections><section id="1"><sectionTitle>Details</sectionTitle><sectionBody>The Andres All Weather Boot is our most anticipated boot of all time Handmade in an ethical family run factory in Le n Mexico the Andres features a water resistant waxed suede upper 1 25 heel and a studded rubber sole that will grip just about any terrain and last you for years to come We went the extra mile to include a gusseted tongue that allows you to withstand the elements yet keep your toes nice and dry Whether you re traveling from country to country or just getting things done around town the Andres All Weather Boot has you covered regardless of the conditions Water resistant waxed suede leather upper 1 25 heel Studded rubber sole Gusseted tongue Leather lining Soft leather insole Handmade in an ethical family run factory in Le n Mexico Fits true to size A taller boot means slightly less flexibility at first as there is more coverage and more leather to break in Give them some time and they will fit like a glove For a roomier fit we recommend sizing up a half size nocontent</sectionBody></section><section id="2"><sectionTitle>Size &amp;
